name: Sudoku with a Gun
description:
Sudoku like never before... With a Gun

The classic puzzle game with a twist, this time you're shooting your way to complete Sudoku puzzles!

Three Unique Ways to Play

Play Sudoku with 3 guns, each with a different playstyle and rules:

  • Pistol - Shoot the spaces to increase it's value
  • Revolver - The number you fire changes after every shot
  • Shotgun - Use left and right click to shoot the number on the timer from each barrel

Infinite Replayability

Challenge yourself with 3 difficulties of puzzles over thousands of puzzles and compete for the highest score on the leader board with each of the three guns.
